title: Nature Lab - Equipment
description: The Nature Lab at RISD offers unmediated access to authentic natural history specimens and fosters creative inquiry involving fields such as biomimetics, biophilic design, ecology and climate change.
cleaned_text: Equipment In addition to being an engaging place for students and faculty to explore science and the human-nature connection, the Nature Lab offers a wide range of specialized equipment and tools that allow for research and documentation of natural materials, specimens, systems and processes. While our microscopy, computing, specialized lighting and other equipment are available for use in the lab only, students are welcome to check out a number of devices for field research, including still and video cameras, audio equipment, GPS trackers, and a variety of field gear. To sign up for individual training or to book time on any piece of equipment please use the [Nature Lab Technology Training + Use Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1hWX86x9V2WYefdZfWCqBS_G4Ew0ePbltVpdVzApH0Tk/viewform?edit_requested=true) at least 24hrs ahead of requested date and wait to receive confirmation from a Nature Lab staff member. For full class reservations in the Microscopy Lab (Rm 12) please use our [Room Request Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1yIAI1C9AxunbzOzNdRjv5btO1KGASfs7cyTFcWolhhI/edit) ideally one week prior to the requested date and wait to receive a confirmation from a Nature Lab staff member.
